span.span: Use this primary interface only when the method you want to use shares the same name as an event of the COM object; in this case, cast to this interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

summary.span: 否则，请使用派生自 COM coclass 的 .NET 接口来访问方法、属性和 COM 对象的事件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoAutomationSecurity AutomationSecurity { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoAutomationSecurity get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoAutomationSecurity value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 常量，该常量代表 Microsoft Word 以编程方式打开文件时使用的安全设置。

span.span: Returns or sets a constant that represents the security setting Microsoft Word uses when programmatically opening files.

para.span: AutomationSecurity 属性的默认设置为 msoAutomationSecurityLow 。

span.span: The default setting of the AutomationSecurity property is msoAutomationSecurityLow.

para.span: 因此，为了避免更改用户的安全设置或破坏依赖于默认设置的解决方案，在以编程方式打开文件后，应注意将此属性设置回其原始设置。

span.span: Therefore, to avoid changing the users' security settings or breaking solutions that rely on the default setting, you should be careful to set this property back to its original setting after programmatically opening a file.

para.span: 设置 为False不会影响通知，并且不会影响安全警告。

span.span: Setting to False does not affect alerts and will not affect security warnings.

para.span: 设置不会应用于安全警告。

span.span: The setting will not apply to security warnings.

para.span: 例如，如果用户将DisplayAlerts设置为False ，并将其设置 为MsoAutomationSecurityByUI，而用户为 "中" 安全级别，则在运行宏时将出现安全警告。

span.span: For example, if the user sets DisplayAlerts equal to False and to msoAutomationSecurityByUI, while the user is on Medium security level, then there will be security warnings while the macro is running.

para.span: 这允许宏捕获文件打开错误，同时仍显示安全警告（如果文件成功打开）。

span.span: This allows the macro to trap file open errors while still showing the security warning if the file open succeeds.

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) that specifies whether charts use cell-reference data-point tracking.

para.span: 在单元格引用数据点跟踪中，数据标签跟踪包含数据点值的单元格引用，而不是数据点的索引号。

span.span: In cell-reference data-point tracking, data labels track the cell reference that contains the value of the data point, rather than the index number of the data point.

para.span: 这样做有助于保留用户应用的自定义格式设置，即使对图表进行排序或筛选也是如此。

span.span: Doing so helps to preserve custom formatting applied by the user, even when a chart is sorted or filtered.

para.span: 将ChartDataPointTrack设置为True指定图表使用单元格引用数据点跟踪。

summary.span: 从指定的字符串中删除非打印字符（字符代码1–29）和特殊 Microsoft Word 字符，或将其更改为空格（字符代码32）。

span.span: Removes nonprinting characters (character codes 1 – 29) and special Microsoft Word characters from the specified string or changes them to spaces (character code 32).

para.span: 以下字符将按此表所示进行转换。

span.span: The following characters are converted as described in this table.
7 (beep)

description.span: 如果前导字符代码不是 13（段落），则将其删除并转换为字符 9（制表符）。

span.span: Removed unless preceded by character 13 (paragraph), then converted to character 9 (tab).
10 (line feed)

description.span: 如果前导字符代码不是 13，则转换为字符 13（段落），然后将其删除。

span.span: Converted to character 13 (paragraph) unless preceded by character 13, then removed.
13 (paragraph)
Unchanged.
31 (optional hyphen)
Removed.
160 (nonbreaking space)
Converted to character 32 (space).
172 (optional hyphen)
Removed.
176 (nonbreaking space)
Converted to character 32 (space).
182 (paragraph mark)
Removed.
183 (bullet)
Converted to character 32 (space).

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

span.span: If the specified object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."

para.span: [!注释] 此值还可以通过常量 wdCreatorCode 表示。

span.span: This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

para.span: Creator属性主要用于在 Macintosh 上使用，其中每个应用程序都有一个四字符创建者代码。

span.span: The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Word 提供了 MSWD 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD.

para.span: 有关此属性的其他信息，请参阅语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本所附带的帮助。

span.span: For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

summary.span: 通过打开的 DDE（动态数据交换）通道向接收应用程序查询信息，并以 String 类型返回该信息。

span.span: Uses an open dynamic data exchange (DDE) channel to request information from the receiving application, and returns the information as a string.

para.span: 动态数据交换 (DDE) 是一种比较陈旧的技术并且不是十分安全。

span.span: Dynamic data exchange (DDE) is an older technology that is not secure.

para.span: 如果可能，请使用更安全的 DDE 替代方法。

span.span: If possible, use a more secure alternative to DDE.

para.span: 当您从服务器应用程序中的主题请求信息时，您必须指定要请求其内容的主题中的项。

span.span: When you request information from the topic in the server application, you must specify the item in that topic whose contents you're requesting.

para.span: 例如，在 Microsoft Excel 中，单元格是合法项目，可以通过"R1C1"格式或已命名的引用来引用单元格。

span.span: In Microsoft Excel, for example, cells are valid items, and you refer to them by using either the "R1C1" format or named references.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 和其他支持 DDE 的应用程序可识别名为"System"的主题。下表对 System 主题中的三个标准项目加以说明。请注意：使用 SysItems 项目可得到 System 主题中的其他项目列表。

span.span: Microsoft Excel and other applications that support DDE recognize a topic named "System." Three standard items in the System topic are described in the following table. Note that you can get a list of the other items in the System topic by using the SysItems item.
SysItems

description.span: 返回 System 主题中的所有项目的列表。

span.span: Returns a list of all the items in the System topic.
Topics

description.span: 返回所有有效主题的列表。

span.span: Returns a list of all the available topics.
Formats

description.span: 返回 Microsoft Word 支持的所有剪贴板格式的列表。

span.span: Returns a list of all the Clipboard formats supported by Microsoft Word.

para.span: 动态数据交换 (DDE) 是一种比较陈旧的技术并且不是十分安全。

span.span: Dynamic data exchange (DDE) is an older technology that is not secure.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DDETerminateAll() runtime managed

summary.span: 关闭所有由 Microsoft Word 打开的动态数据交换 (DDE) 通道。

span.span: Closes all dynamic data exchange (DDE) channels opened by Microsoft Word.

para.span: 此方法不会关闭客户端应用程序向 Word 打开的通道。

span.span: This method doesn't close channels opened to Word by client applications.

para.span: 使用此方法与 对每个打开的通道使用方法相同。

span.span: Using this method is the same as using the method for each open channel.

para.span: 动态数据交换 (DDE) 是一种比较陈旧的技术并且不是十分安全。

span.span: Dynamic data exchange (DDE) is an older technology that is not secure.

para.span: 如果可能，请使用更安全的 DDE 替代方法。

span.span: If possible, use a more secure alternative to DDE.

para.span: 如果中断打开 DDE 通道的宏，可能会无意中使一个通道处于打开状态。

span.span: If you interrupt a macro that opens a DDE channel, you may inadvertently leave a channel open.

para.span: 当宏结束时，打开的通道不会自动关闭，并且每个打开的通道都将使用系统资源。

span.span: Open channels aren't closed automatically when a macro ends, and each open channel uses system resources.

para.span: 因此，在调试打开一个或多个 DDE 通道的代码时，最好使用此方法。

span.span: For this reason, it's a good idea to use this method when you're debugging code that opens one or more DDE channels.

summary.span: 返回或设置一个Boolean类型的值，该值表示 Microsoft Office Word 是否在运行其他代码后保持该插入点的位置的文本的格式属性。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean that represents whether Microsoft Office Word maintains the formatting properties of the text at that position of the Insertion Point after running other code.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 有时，在运行其他 Microsoft Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) 代码后，Word 会丢失插入点的格式。如果发生这样的情况，则会给依赖屏幕读取器应用程序的用户造成困难。当用户的辅助应用程序执行看起来不相关的任务时，他们会丢失格式。当运行包含 Word 对象模型中的属性或方法的其他代码时，此属性可防止 Word 丢失或更改位于插入点位置的文本的格式。

span.span: In some cases, Word loses the formatting at the Insertion Point after running other Microsoft Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) code. When this happens, it can cause difficulty for users who rely on a screen reader application. They lose the formatting when their assistive application performs what seems like unrelated tasks. This property prevents Word from losing or changing the formatting that has been applied to the text at the position of the Insertion Point when other code runs that contains properties or methods in the Word object model.

para.span: 重要说明：请勿使用此属性，除非明确需要它才能正确设置解决方案。

span.span: Important: Do not use this property unless you specifically need it to make a solution function correctly.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdEnableCancelKey EnableCancelKey { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdEnableCancelKey get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdEnableCancelKey value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置 Word 处理 Ctrl+Break 用户中断的方式。

span.span: Returns or sets the way that Word handles CTRL+BREAK user interruptions.

para.span: 使用此属性时应非常小心。

span.span: Use this property very carefully.

para.span: 如果使用wdCancelDisabled，则无法中断失控循环或其他非自终止代码。

span.span: If you use wdCancelDisabled, there's no way to interrupt a runaway loop or other non – self-terminating code.

para.span: 另外，当代码停止运行时，除非明确地重新设置其值，否则 EnableCancelKey 属性不会重新设置为 wdCancelInterrupt，该属性在 Word 会话期间内仍为 wdCancelDisabled。

span.span: Also, the EnableCancelKey property is not reset to wdCancelInterrupt when your code stops running; unless you explicitly reset its value, it will remain set to wdCancelDisabled for the duration of the Word session.

summary.span: 返回或设置 Microsoft Word 如何处理调用方法和属性的需要尚未安装的功能。

span.span: Returns or sets how Microsoft Word handles calls to methods and properties that require features not yet installed.

para.span: MsoFeatureInstallOnDemandWithUI 常量可用于防止用户认为该应用程序没有响应时安装的功能的。如果您想开发人员是唯一可以安装的功能的用户，请使用 msoFeatureInstallNone 常量。

span.span: You can use the msoFeatureInstallOnDemandWithUI constant to prevent users from believing that the application isn't responding while a feature is being installed. Use the msoFeatureInstallNone constant if you want the developer to be the only one who can install features.

para.span: 如果将该 属性设置为False，则即使FeatureInstall属性设置为msoFeatureInstallOnDemand，也不会提示用户安装新功能。

span.span: If you have the property set to False, users will not be prompted to install new features even if the FeatureInstall property is set to msoFeatureInstallOnDemand.

para.span: 如果 DisplayAlerts 属性设置为 True ，将 FeatureInstall 属性设置为 msoFeatureInstallOnDemand 将显示安装进度计量表。

span.span: If the DisplayAlerts property is set to True, an installation progress meter will appear if the FeatureInstall property is set to msoFeatureInstallOnDemand.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OnTime (ref object When, string Name, ref object Tolerance);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTime([in]object& When, [in]string Name, [in]object& Tolerance) runtime managed
Public Sub OnTime (ByRef When As Object, Name As String, Optional ByRef Tolerance As Object)
abstract member OnTime : obj * string * obj -> unit

param.name: When

span.span: Required Object.
The time at which the macro is to be run.

param.span: 可以是指定时间的字符串（例如，"4:30 pm" 或 "16:30"），也可以是函数（如TimeValue或TimeSerial ）返回的序列号（例如，TimeValue （"2： 30 Pm"）或 TimeSerial （14，30，00））。

span.span: Can be a string that specifies a time (for example, "4:30 pm" or "16:30"), or it can be a serial number returned by a function such as TimeValue or TimeSerial (for example, TimeValue("2:30 pm") or TimeSerial(14, 30, 00)).

param.span: 您还可以包括日期（例如，"6/30 4:15 pm" 或 TimeValue （"6/30 4:15 pm"））。使用Now函数的返回值总和和TimeValue或TimeSerial函数设置计时器，在语句运行后指定的一段时间运行宏。

span.span: You can also include the date (for example, "6/30 4:15 pm" or TimeValue("6/30 4:15 pm")).Use the sum of the return values of the Now function and either the TimeValue or TimeSerial function to set a timer to run a macro a specified amount of time after the statement is run.

param.span: 例如，使用 Now+TimeValue("00:05:30") 可以使宏在语句运行后再过 5 分 30 秒运行。

span.span: For example, use Now+TimeValue("00:05:30") to run a macro 5 minutes and 30 seconds after the statement is run.

param.name: Name

span.span: Required String.
The name of the macro to be run.

param.span: 使用完整的宏路径以确保运行正确的宏（例如，"Macro1"）。

span.span: Use the complete macro path to ensure that the correct macro is run (for example, "Project.Module1.Macro1").

param.span: 若要运行该宏，文档或模板必须在OnTime指令运行时以及 "到达时" 指定的时间可用 。

span.span: For the macro to run, the document or template must be available both when the OnTime instruction is run and when the time specified by arrives.

param.span: 因此，最好将宏存储在 normal.dot 或另一个自动加载的全局模板中。

span.span: For this reason, it's best to store the macro in Normal.dot or another global template that's loaded automatically.

param.name: Tolerance

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 在取消指定的时间之前未运行的宏之前可以经过的最长时间（以秒为单位） 。

span.span: The maximum time (in seconds) that can elapse before a macro that wasn't run at the time specified by is canceled.

param.span: 宏不一定总在指定时间运行。

span.span: Macros may not always run at the specified time.

param.span: 例如，如果正在进行排序操作，或者正在显示某一对话框，则宏将延迟到 Word 完成当前任务后才运行。

span.span: For example, if a sort operation is under way or a dialog box is being displayed, the macro will be delayed until Word has completed the task.

param.span: 如果此参数为0（零）或被省略，则无论自指定的时间以来经过了多长时间，都会运行宏 。

span.span: If this argument is 0 (zero) or omitted, the macro is run regardless of how much time has elapsed since the time specified by .

summary.span: 启动在指定的时间运行宏的后台计时器。

span.span: Starts a background timer that runs a macro at a specified time.

para.span: Microsoft Word 只能维护一个由OnTime设置的背景计时器。

span.span: Microsoft Word can maintain only one background timer set by OnTime.

para.span: 如果在现有计时器运行之前，您可以启动另一个计时器，则取消现有计时器。

span.span: If you start another timer before an existing timer runs, the existing timer is canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ScreenRefresh() runtime managed

summary.span: 使用视频内存缓冲区的当前信息更新显示器的显示。

span.span: Updates the display on the monitor with the current information in the video memory buffer.

para.span: 可以在使用 属性禁用屏幕更新之后使用此方法。

span.span: You can use this method after using the property to disable screen updates.

para.span: ScreenRefresh 打开屏幕更新只是一个指令，然后立即将其关闭。

span.span: ScreenRefresh turns on screen updating for just one instruction and then immediately turns it off.

para.span: 后续指令不更新屏幕，直到屏幕更新再次打开的 ScreenUpdating 属性。

span.span: Subsequent instructions don't update the screen until screen updating is turned on again with the ScreenUpdating property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ScreenUpdating { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ScreenUpdating : bool with get, set

summary.span: 确定是否打开了屏幕更新。

span.span: Determines if screen updating is turned on.

summary.span: 如果打开屏幕更新，则返回True ，否则返回False 。

span.span: Returns True if screen updating is turned on, and False if not.

para.span: ScreenUpdating 属性控件最在某个过程正在运行时在显示器上显示更改。

span.span: The ScreenUpdating property controls most display changes on the monitor while a procedure is running.

para.span: 当屏幕更新关闭时，工具栏仍保持可见，Microsoft Word 仍允许过程使用状态栏提示、输入框、对话框和消息框显示或检索信息。

span.span: When screen updating is turned off, toolbars remain visible and Microsoft Word still allows the procedure to display or retrieve information using status bar prompts, input boxes, dialog boxes, and message boxes.

para.span: 通过保持关闭屏幕更新，可以提高某些过程的速度。

span.span: You can increase the speed of some procedures by keeping screen updating turned off.

para.span: 当该过程完成后或者在出错后停止时，必须设置 ScreenUpdating 属性设 为 True 。

span.span: You must set the ScreenUpdating property to True when the procedure finishes or when it stops after an error.

Public Sub SetDefaultTheme (Name As String, DocumentType As WdDocumentMedium)

param.name: Name

span.span: Required String.

param.span: 由要指定为默认主题的主题名称加上任何要应用的主题格式选项组成。

span.span: The name of the theme you want to assign as the default theme plus any theme formatting options you want to apply.

param.span: 此字符串的格式为 " "，并按如下所 示定义： StringDescriptionthemeThe 包含所请求主题的数据的文件夹的名称。

span.span: The format of this string is "" where and are defined as follows:StringDescriptionthemeThe name of the folder that contains the data for the requested theme.

param.span: （主题数据文件夹的默认位置是 C:\Program Files\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Themes.）必须使用主题的文件夹名称，而不是显示在主题对话框（主题命令，"格式" 菜单）中的显示名称。 nnnA 三个数字字符串，用于指示要激活的主题格式选项（1为激活，0表示停用）。

span.span: (The default location for theme data folders is C:\Program Files\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Themes.) You must use the folder name for the theme rather than the display name that appears in the Theme dialog box (Theme command, Format menu).nnnA three-digit string that indicates which theme formatting options to activate (1 to activate, 0 to deactivate).

param.span: 每个数字分别对应“主题”对话框（“格式”菜单中的“主题”命令）中的“鲜艳颜色”、“动态图形”和“背景图像”复选框。

span.span: The digits correspond to the Vivid Colors, Active Graphics, and Background Image check boxes in the Theme dialog box (Theme command, Format menu).

param.span: 如果省略此字符串，则的默认值 为 "011" （活动图形和背景图像将被激活）。

span.span: If this string is omitted, the default value for is "011" (Active Graphics and Background Image are activated).

param.name: DocumentType

span.span: Required .

param.span: 为其指定默认主题的新文档的类型。

span.span: The type of new document to which you are assigning a default theme.

summary.span: 为 Microsoft Word 设置用于新文档、电子邮件或网页的默认主题。

span.span: Sets a default theme for Microsoft Word to use with new documents, e-mail messages, or Web pages.

para.span: 如果设置了一个默认主题，则此主题将不用于启动 Word 时自动创建的空白文档。此后所创建的任何文档都将具有该默认主题。

span.span: Setting a default theme will not apply that theme to the blank document automatically created when you start Word. Any new documents you create after that will have the default theme.

para.span: 您还可以使用 属性返回并设置新电子邮件的默认主题。

span.span: You can also use the property to return and set the default theme for new e-mail messages.

summary.span: 确定文档或应用程序是由用户创建还是打开。

span.span: Determines if the document or application was created or opened by the user.

para.span: 如果文档或应用程序是由用户创建或打开的，则此属性返回True ，如果以编程方式创建或打开文档或应用程序，则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if the document or application was created or opened by the user, and False if the document or application was created or opened programmatically.

para.span: 如果 Microsoft Word 对用户可见，或者UserControl 从 Word 代码模块中调用对象的 UserControl 属性，则该属性将始终返回True。

span.span: If Microsoft Word is visible to the user, or if you call the UserControl property of an object from within a Word code module, this property will always return True.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WordBasic As Object
public: property System::Object ^ WordBasic { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个自动化对象（Word Basic），其中包括 Microsoft Word 版本6.0 和 Word for Windows 95 中提供的所有 WordBasic 语句和函数的方法。

span.span: Returns an automation object (Word.Basic) that includes methods for all the WordBasic statements and functions available in Microsoft Word version 6.0 and Word for Windows 95.

para.span: 在 Word 2000 及其后续版本中，当打开一个包含 WordBasic 宏的 Word 6.0 或 Word for Windows 95 模板时，宏将自动转换为 VB 模块。宏内部的每个 WordBasic 语句和函数都转换为相应的 Word.Basic 方法。

span.span: In Word 2000 and later, when you open a Word version 6.0 or Word for Windows 95 template that contains WordBasic macros, the macros are automatically converted to Visual Basic modules. Each WordBasic statement and function in the macro is converted to the corresponding Word.Basic method.

para.span: 有关 WordBasic 语句和函数的信息，请参阅 Word 6.0 或 Word for Windows 95 中的"WordBasic 帮助"。

span.span: For information about WordBasic statements and functions, see WordBasic Help in Word version 6.0 or Word for Windows 95.
